dict.acceptation: 科技（总称）；工业技术；工艺学；[总称]术语；

sent.orig: Technology trading includes such trading activities as technology development, technology transfer, technology consultation and technology services.
sent.trans: 技术交易包括技术开发、技术转让、技术咨询、技术服务等交易活动。

sent.orig: Computer Network Technology is a computer technology and communication technology, intelligent building is the core technology.
sent.trans: 计算机网络技术是计算机技术与通信技术的结合，是智能建筑的核心技术。

sent.orig: With the development of ADC technology and IC technology, digital receiver technology becomes maturely.
sent.trans: 随着AD转换技术和大规模集成电路的的发展，数字中频接收技术日趋成熟。

sent.orig: It is the production of synthesis and integration of computer technology, communication technology and control technology.
sent.trans: 它是计算机技术、通信技术和控制技术高度综合与集成的产物，是一种开放式和分布式的新模式。

sent.orig: Information technology is the most quickly developed and widely used technology system in technology history.
sent.trans: 现代信息技术是技术史上发展最快应用最广的技术体系。
